entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • COM Hosting not supported for C++/CLR projects (.NET Core+) #108804
  • Timeout on deleting builds for Wasm.Build.Tests.TestAppScenarios.SatelliteLoadingTests.LoadSatelliteAssembly #108801
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException in NtProcessInfoHelper.GetProcessInfos when retrieving Process.SessionId #108798
  • Block layout of partition loop not ideal #108794
  • Connection strings stored in K8s CSI Volumes are not resolved during function discovery #108793
  • JIT doesn't do CSE for comparison on string.Length #108791
    Future
  • Regression in .NET 9-RC2: Case-insensitive handling of JsonNode #108790
    9.0.0
  • [System.Text.Json] Consider removing `RequiresUnreferenceCode`/`RequiresDynamicCode` annotations from certain `JsonSerializer` APIs #108781
    10.0.0

Closed

  • osx/arm64: Assertion failed 'm_store->TypeGet() == m_src->TypeGet()' during 'Assertion prop' #108612
    9.0.0
  • Should stack traces collected in filters have managed EH frames in them? #107995
    9.0.0
  • win/x64: Assertion failed 'false && "found use of a node that is not in the LIR sequence"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #108613
    9.0.0
  • GC picks wrong L3 cache size on Linux #76290
    10.0.0
  • OpenAPI hangs on XElement #108755
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Custom schema generation in STJ #108778
  • [WASI] When upgrading to vnext version of the WASI_SDK with clang19 there are build errors #108686
  • Runtime fails to marshal arguments, throws ArgumentException in corner case COM interop scenario #11498
  • EventSource.Write corrupts nullable values in Release builds using .NET Native (UWP) #13065
  • How to run unit tests with corerun? #108768
  • 我应该如何正确的使用 IIncrementalGenerator #108744

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix CET debugger stepping over CALL instructions #108809
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Unroll SpanHelpers.SequenceEqual in a late phase #108808
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: reset reverse opts when updating HW intrinsic #108807
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump versions of maintenance-packages dependencies consumed in runtime #108806
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Arm64: Use TYP_SIMD8 for AddAcross #108805
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] Fix optimization of Vector512 And + Not to AndNot #108803
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update source-build team references #108802
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/9.0] Update the JSON schema exporter to reuse schemas more aggressively. #108800
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Reduce net core app current package dependencies, increase direct update availability #108797
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [JIT] Add legacy extended EVEX encoding and EVEX.ND feature to x64 emitter backend #108796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Updated runtime test building doc #108792
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Mitigate first-class Span breaks #108789
    area-codeflow
  • Remove RUC & RDC annotations from certain JsonSerializer methods. #108782
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Rename `WasmBuildTests` settings to the names of properties they impact #108780
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [cdac] Make cDAC delegate to the DAC instead of the other way around #108772
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: very simple cloning heuristic #108771
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] WebSocket stress #108770
    area-System.Net

Merged

  • Make RC2 light up for OpenSSLs built with -no-rc2 #108795
    area-System.Security
  • [release/9.0] Remove string.Trim{,Start,End}(ReadOnlySpan<char>) ref-API #108777
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime, breaking-change
  • Add project to create helix work items for host tests #108529
    area-Host
  • Arm64: Use TYP_SIMD8 for AddAcross #108727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove managed EH code frames from stack trace #108723
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix optimization of Vector512 And + Not to AndNot #108775
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] bgc deadlock fix #108774
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix an issue with the last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors #108492
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] [wasm] Include browser targets if RID is not wasi-wasm #108434
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • [release/9.0] [browser] Make boot json file name configurable #108708
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove string.Trim{,Start,End}(ReadOnlySpan<char>) #108537
    area-System.Runtime, blocking-release, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Update the JSON schema exporter to reuse schemas more aggressively. #108764
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Add test case for deserializing JsonObject as JsonExtensionData #108673
    area-System.Text.Json, 10.0.0
  • Delete UsePublishedCrossgen2 property #108693
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • JIT: Use binary search in `FlowGraphNaturalLoops::GetLoopByHeader` #108739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fold `(x + c1) + c2` in lowering #108779
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the instruction check in 'CodeGen::genInstrWithConstant()' when called by 'CodeGen::genHomeStackSegment()'. #108776
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • Remove BrotliUtils.MaxInputSize #108769
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [WASI] Updates to work with up coming Wasi sdk #108687
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-wasi
  • bgc deadlock fix #108773
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fixes deadlock for IncrementingPollingCounter callbacks #108648
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.11
  • Disable codeql on official builds part 2 #108767
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: run a late pass of empty try/finally/fault removal #108003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • System.Net Stress Tests Improvements 2 #108703
    area-System.Net
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete DomainAssembly #108618
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Consolidate LocateNativeCompiler target #103375
    NO-MERGE, blocked, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [cdac] ExecutionManager contract and RangeSectionMap lookup unit tests #108685
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense to 20241010.1 #108765
    documentation, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked
  • [release/9.0] Bump Microsoft.Private.Intellisense to 20241010.1 #108766
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocked, 9.0.0
  • Delete STUBLINKER_GENERATES_UNWIND_INFO #108684
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Automatically synthesize ilproj assembly names for tests #108730
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [CG] Bump Microsoft.IO.Redist to 6.0.1 #106102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Keep delegate object alive during invoke #105099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Stop calling morph from CSE #106695
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Switch `SwiftSelf<T>` position requirement to last #108547
    area-Interop-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix `IsOSVersionAtLeast` when build or revision are not provided #108748
    area-System.Runtime, os-maccatalyst, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Stop testing with V8 and `wasmconsole` #108711
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Remove all kernel32.dll references and debug breakpoints #108647
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix SortedSet.InternalIndexOf 102118 #102249
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2557971 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable linux-x64 dev-innerloop #108581
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Implement ProcessStartInfo.InheritHandles for Windows #107836
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-11
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Fix unwinding for StubLink #2713

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement stack traces on WASI via precise virtual unwinding #2697
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [SwiftBindings] Documented binding PATs and alternative to vtables #2707
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet tool install with workaround NUGET_CERT_REVOCATION_MODE does no longer work #44123
  • DynamicallyAccessedMembersAnalyzer throws an internal exception due to source location outside compilation #44120
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #44114
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #44113
  • Add command line option or environment variable to disable workload message #44112
  • Allow integration for SDK references for dotnet fsi (F# interactive) #44110
  • option to ignore SSL error when install/update dotnet tool #44094

Closed

  • Offline dotnet new console #44122
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx-rc2` can't be mirrored to Azdo fast forward branch #43563
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `sdk/release/9.0.1xx-rc1` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #43266

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump version of Microsoft.IO.Redist to preview from maintenance-packages #44121
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • create rpms that track inner directories for cleanup #44119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44117
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add extra properties for test results in dotnet test #44109
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Install scripts update validation PR #44097
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE

Merged

  • Update source-build team references #44118
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add local package patterns to source-mappings for online feeds #44076
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #44085
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #44075
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Process endpoint definitions in parallel #43736
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #44081
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #44091
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Update to the November release downlevel versions #43523
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.2xx' => 'main' #43959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the error for targeting net9 in 17.11 #43143
    untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Switch back to 17.8.3 for the minimum msbuild version #43995
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.11
  • [release/9.0.1xx] AuthHandshakeMessageHandler: sync behavior with other clients. #43942
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #43839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Use PortableRid config value for self-contained publish test #43244
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Linux: Installing/Updating packages with uppercase versions #43988
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the sdk target to net10.0 #43015
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2558571 #43920
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove WorkloadManifestValidator stub project #43642
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update bootstrap arcade #44086
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • When updating workload versions, don't try to update to an older version, or to the same version currently installed #43931
  • fix port error when fallback to http #44050
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Expand osx-arm64 test coverage #44008
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Backport] Backports perf fixes to static web assets to RTM #43971
    Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Visual Studio IDE tool tips for method parameters do not display all parameters when there is a very large number as it overflows tool tip text limit. #75486
  • Value tracking window doesn't track setting to null value #75485
  • The compiler should report an error about references to out-of-scope stack memory generated by [UnscopedRef], defensively copied struct and pattern matching #75484
  • Regression in .NET 9 RC2: IDE0052 reports false positive with source-generated method #75483
    Backlog

Closed

  • Quick info shows incorrect `Dispose` method when hovering over `using` keyword #75429
    Backlog
  • Old release branch signed builds are broken #74649
    17.12 P3
  • crash on assigning result of a switch expression to a constant #75353
    17.13
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.shadowDebug-35410.215 #75481
  • Synthesized backing field generated for non-auto property with `[field:]` attribute #75459

PullRequests

Created

  • Add --sign switch on non-windows platforms #75491
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • VB: Do not use overload resolution for expression tree conversion #75490
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Do not pin the Compilers.Toolset version #75488
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Test case for analyzer dependency loading #75487
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Build and publish .ni.pdb for R2R images #75489
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Improve quick info on `using` keyword #75462
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • [release/dev17.10] Merge from internal 17.10 #75471
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Fix circularity issue with binding const local #75371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Update "first-class Span" feature status #75474
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Field-backed properties: [field:] should not be considered a backing field reference #75461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • VB: Do not use overload resolution while lowering interpolated strings #75449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Cache checksum computation at an collection-element level #75479
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, New Language Feature - File-Local Types, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Report LSP loading telemetry #75402
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Report diagnostics from `TryFindDisposePatternMethod` when binding `foreach` loop #75422
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update to net9.0 #75465
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, VSCode
  • [release/dev17.11] Merge from internal 17.11 #75472
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • [release/dev17.8] Merge from internal 17.8 #75468
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix assignment analysis of ref fields #75340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Allow suppressing foreach iteration variable nullability mismatch #75432
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, multiple_queries #58371
  • [Blazor][Antiforgery] Error 400 for a static SSR page, related to the constant antiforgery token update, if the redirect was from another domain. #58370
  • UseHealthChecks does not allow trailing slash as documented #58369
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `aspnetcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #58367
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #58360
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, single_query #58359
  • Determine if request is for static asset #58358
  • esproj does not have a target for pack and breaks dotnet pack #58356

Closed

  • InputDate Docs has a broken list #57357
    Backlog
  • OpenIdConnectHandler.ValidateTokenUsingHandlerAsync() does not copy a value from the _configuration.Issuer #58327
  • Adding IdentityUserClaim navigation property to ApplicationUser causes migration to create new FK #58147
    9.0.0
  • Perf improvement: updates #58334
  • Como hackear o instagram de alguem 2024 #58361
  • Trusting the https certificate on Linux platforms fails with the error: "exporting the HTTPS developer certificate to a file." #58337
  • OpenAPI documentation is incorrect when using custom TryParse() binding with Minimal APIs #58318
  • Server-side Blazor Disable IUserIdProvider ？ #58112
  • AddAuthentication with AddOpenIdConnect, and webapp behind a proxy produce different callback URIs depending on client side rendering or server side rendering #57916

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove dead code and clean up multisz/a #58373
    area-networking
  • [release/9.0] Fix ModelMetadata for TryParse-parameters in ApiExplorer #58372
    Servicing-consider, area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Unquarantine StreamPool_MultipleStreamsConcurrent_StreamsReturnedToPool #58368
    area-networking
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Install scripts update validation PR #58364
    area-infrastructure, * NO MERGE *

Merged

  • Fix missing bullet list items in InputDate documentation #58310
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Simplifying TFA Validation Logic in MapIdentityApi #57989
    area-identity, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Use dependabot for Nuget instead of NPM #58342
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a1e255a` to `71815bb` #58362
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix ModelMetadata for TryParse-parameters in ApiExplorer #58350
    area-mvc, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/9.0] Fix handling for inert route parameters in MVC endpoints for OpenAPI #58311
    area-mvc, feature-openapi
  • Use new Dictionary AlternateLookup to avoid allocation in DictionaryJumpTable #58305
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • [s390x] Fix Extensions.ApiDescription.Client tests on s390x #58235
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #58218
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • Run static code analysis on IIS #58167
    feature-iis, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

Issues

  • Improve name2ee output #4993
    10.0.0

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [MAUI] ListView rendering issues when binding the IsVisible property. #25221
  • Filter "Remarks" from Maui properties Intellisense #25220
  • MAUI Android ListView using ViewCell with cells with borders does not appear to wrap text when Label has LineBreakMode="WordWrap" #25219
  • [NETSDKE2E][VS64][Loc].NET MAUI Multi-Project App template on "Create a new dialog" is not localized. #25218
  • [MAUI] Set the Resize attribute to “False” for MauiSplashScreen, it will keep previous SplashScreen’s app icon and icon background. #25217
  • [Loc] The description of template .NET MAUI Multi-Project App project is not localized #25216
  • [Loc] The string “Framework” is not localized when creating new maui application #25215
  • In VS2022 17.11 Preview 5.0, when creating multi-project solution, the solution file gets duplicated and the progress is shown indefinitely #25213
  • Inconsistent Debugging with MultiValueConverterExtension crash #25212
  • .NET MAUI how to render HTML in Label #25211
  • BindingContext is returning null #25210
  • Cannot use SetModalPresentationStyle in MAUI project #25209
  • Unable to load library libSkiaSharp #25208
  • Creating .NET MAUI Project sometimes causes error *.png is being used by another process #25207
  • Creating .NET MAUI Project sometimes causes transient errors in MainPage.xaml.cs #25206
  • .NET MAUI CollectionView Item is not read by screen readers #25204
  • Customizing-.NET-MAUI-Shell - when navigate next page #25202
  • Actionsheet maximum size has been hardcoded on windows, creating display issues #25200
  • [net9-rc2] Trim analysis warning IL2026 using XamlTypeResolver with Compiled Bindings #25199
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Add SeparatorTemplate to BindableLayout #25198
  • MAUI Create your app - not able to create and facing error XA1018 Specified AndroidManifest file does not exist #25196
  • [iOS] New CollectionViewHandler2 "swallows" attached properties #25195
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Background gradients don't work for some views #25193
  • CarouselView Loop="False" renders incorrectly items ( net8, net9 rc2) #25192
  • CollectionView ItemSizingStrategy:"MeasureFirstItem" renders labels incorrectly (.net8, .net9) #25191
    Backlog
  • Shell MenuItemTemplate Broken #25190
    .NET 9 SR1
  • Wrong Binding Source #25189

Closed

  • [MAUI] XA1018 Specified AndroidManifest file does not exist #25222
  • [Android] Invisible ImageButton Padding Broken #25201
  • Slow build -> deploy on iOS #14560
  • .AddCompatibilityRenderer() for old renderer using interface IVisualElementRenderer doesn't work in .NET MAUI #25148
  • Maui platform symbols still broken in Vstudio 2022 #24366
  • iOS can't select PDF - FilePicker #25051
  • Leak caused by activity indicator. #25012
  • Why is button event click not working inside AbsoluteLayout for Window #25063
  • WebView can not show whole page #10134
  • iOS: content page is showing flyout menu icon when back button is set to false in flyout pages app #12289
  • Default .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid App fails to run on Windows 11 with Visual Studio 17.11.2 #24795
  • A sample app stops working after the 1st run #23374

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix ImageButton Padding the third #25223
    community ✨
  • [Backport] Fix Regression with iOS button resizing with text or image change #25214
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button
  • [nuget-msi-convert] Support improved VS component IDs #25205
  • [housekeeping] Enable TSA upload #25203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Added a null check for setting BarBackgroundColor for a NavigationPage #25197
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, potential-regression
  • Background gradients fixes #25194
    area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨

Merged

  • Revert #24222 and simply use `invalidate` instead of `postInvalidate` #24990
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, .NET 9.0 GA

Updated

  • Fixed Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #25003
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨
  • Fix Regression with iOS button resizing with text or image change #25122
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button, .NET 8 SR9.2
  • [Testing] Add UITest Stepper actions #25130
    area-testing
  • ImageButton border (BorderWidth) overlaps the image instead of adding space - fix #21259
    community ✨, area-controls-border
  • [android] Fallback to default icons in SearchHandler #25067
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Try build arcade net9 #25085
  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fixed VisualState Update for CollectionView SelectedItem #25145
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS]Resolved Button Text Resets to Previous Value When Set to Empty String Programmatically. #25171
    community ✨
  • Entry Height gets updated when loaded inside the RoundRectangle Shape #25166
    community ✨
  • Fix for MenuFlyoutItem stops working after navigating away from and back to page #25170
    community ✨
  • Support for Setting Switch Off State Color #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fixed Editor HorizontalTextAlignment Does not Works. #25129
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • [Windows] Fix for the issue with Label text color when resetting from FormattedText. #25119
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label
  • [Testing] More UITests extension methods using an IQuery as parameter #25177
    area-testing
  • Speed-up Border rendering by avoiding useless pass during size allocation #24844
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, t/perf
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titleview
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨
  • [iOS] Put the UIScrollView into a UIView in a border handler #25098
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [iOS] Changed UIImageRenderingMode for buttons #25107
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-button
  • Add a hard liimit on the size of an Image which can be loaded #24305
    area-controls-image
  • [XC] Propagate x:DataType from parent scope to "standalone bindings" #25152
  • [XC] Fix support for x:TypeArguments on root node #25183
  • [XC] Fix passing message arguments to BuildException when logging warning as error #25151
  • [Testing] Enabling ported UITests from Xamarin.UITests to Appium #1 #25178
    area-testing
  • [Android] Fix for span GestureRecognizers don't work when the span is wrapped over two lines. #25180
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, area-gestures
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Disable NSToolbar Tabs #25184

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Problem using DefaultAzureCredential() with Cosmos EF -- More than twenty 'IServiceProvider' instances have been created. #34889

Closed

  • "The entity type" "is mapped to the stored procedure" "however the store-generated properties" "are not mapped to any output parameter or result column." #34863
  • Invalid Column Name 'XXX' Exception When Using GroupJoin Without Foreign Key Relationship #34339
  • [Microsoft.Data.Sqlite] Version of NuGet dependency SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 does not correspond with source code #34860
  • Compiled Model causes InvalidOperationException on first call #34817
  • change LogExecutedCommand elapsed parameter from string to int or do not send thousands seperator #34281
  • Application crash when locking `compilationLock` in `RelationalCommandCache.cs` #34796
  • Handling DbUpdateConcurrencyException inside TransactionScope #34873
  • System.Data.SqlClient is out of date #34856

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Avoid infinite recursion on identifying shadow FKs #34892
    Servicing-consider
  • [release/8.0] Avoid infinite recursion on identifying shadow FKs #34891
    Servicing-consider
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34890
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #34887
  • [release/9.0] Fix conditional test evaluation in funcletizer #34886
    Servicing-approved

Merged

  • [release/9.0] (TELL MODE) small xml doc fix (copy paste error) (#34857) #34888
    tell-mode
  • [release/8.0] Update Microsoft.Extensions.HostFactoryResolver.Sources version #34884
    tell-mode
  • add MariaDB to README.md #34885
  • [release/9.0] Don't execute empty batches #34870
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #34854
  • Expose SQLite VFS option in connection string #34864
  • Add implementation for Nanoseconds and Microseconds for DateTime[Offset], TimeSpan, {Date|Time}Only. #34861
  • fix-kusto-scaffold #34832
  • [release/9.0] Don't break transactions across batches #34869
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Don't execute empty batches #34882
    Servicing-approved
